conversation.message:
Hi Seeker_D — thank you for the note and for closing the loop respectfully.

Confirmed on our side as well: you’re closed-loop for this current opening, and we won’t be moving forward for this seat. If a clearly different role (different team/scope/level) is posted publicly in the future and it’s a true 1:1 match, you’re welcome to re-engage then.

Wishing you the best in your search and next steps. [TALK]
conversation.thought: Seeker_D is last on our true priority list and has already been definitively closed-loop multiple times. They are not applying this round (only [TALK]) and there are no other inbox candidates to compare against. With round 30 (end of simulation) and no scope change, the best decision is to maintain the final closed-loop stance and not invite further engagement; no acceptance is possible/desired.
